title: From Lima: All-Inclusive Day trip to Paracas & Huacachina Oasis
provider:

Tim M
Grimsby, Canada8 contributions

Jaime's excellent Huacachina experience.

Sep 2025 • Couples
Jaime is an excellent guide and Carlos is a great driver who got us to our destinations efficiently and safely. Jaime provided great commentary on all things Peruvian and non Peruvian. The Huacachina oasis and dune buggy ride was a blast. The private option was well worth our while as we were able to skip the Ballestas Islands boat ride in order to have more time to prepare for an early flight the next day. We were a little disappointed that we were not credited with the cost of the boat ride, but we did not let that detract from an excellent tour.
Written September 28, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
berriostravel
Thank you very much for your thoughtful review. We’re delighted that you enjoyed your day with Jaime and Carlos, and that Huacachina and the dune buggy ride were such memorable highlights.

reviews.title: Jaime's excellent Huacachina experience.
reviews.text: Jaime is an excellent guide and Carlos is a great driver who got us to our destinations efficiently and safely.  Jaime provided great commentary on all things Peruvian and non Peruvian.  The Huacachina oasis and dune buggy ride was a blast.  The private option was well worth our while as we were able to skip the Ballestas Islands boat ride in order to have more time to prepare for an early flight the next day.  We were a little disappointed that we were not credited with the cost of the boat ride, but we did not let that detract from an excellent tour.

reviews.title: Best Way to Explore Paracas & Huacachina in a Day
reviews.text: We recently joined the All Inclusive Day Trip to Paracas & Huacachina Oasis and had a fantastic experience! Everything was very well organized from start to finish.Our driver Henry was safe, professional, and made the long journey comfortable. Our guide Jaime was knowledgeable, friendly, and always made sure we were having a good time. He explained everything clearly and added a personal touch to the experience.The tour itself was an amazing combination of sights — from the boat ride in Paracas with its stunning views and wildlife, to the unforgettable adventure in the Huacachina desert oasis.We highly recommend this tour to anyone visiting Lima who wants to explore more of Peru in just one day. Thank you Henry and Jaime for making it such a memorable trip!

reviews.title: Fun filled day
reviews.text: An unforgettable day with Henry and Jaime!Our private tour was an absolutely incredible experience, from start to finish. We had a fantastic time exploring the sand dunes in a buggy, which was a thrilling way to see the landscape. The wine tasting was a delightful surprise, offering a unique and relaxed break in our adventure. The marine boat tour was equally amazing, giving us a beautiful perspective from the water.A huge part of what made this tour so special was our driver, Henry, and our guide, Jaime. Henry was an exceptionally safe and skilled driver, making us feel completely at ease on the roads. Jaime was the perfect tour guide—knowledgeable, fun, and attentive to every detail. They both went above and beyond to make sure we had the best day possible.I highly recommend this private tour to anyone looking for a unique and action-packed day. Thank you, Henry and Jaime, for a truly memorable experience!

reviews.title: A long day very well spent! One of the best day trips I’ve been on!
reviews.text: I had the best time!!!!! Let me start by setting expectations, it is a LONG day! I got picked up at 5:45 AM and I got dropped off at 10:45 PM. So, with that in mind, one of the best day trips I’ve been on EVER! Jaime, our guide and Henry, our driver, took such excellent care of us. Our tiny group of 3 didn’t wait any lines, everything was organized so smoothly and come hungry!!! There was so much great food and the alcohol was great too!  I saw penguins, sea lions, got splashed by Pacific Ocean water (maybe bring a rain jacket or sit in middle of the boat), got to learn about Peruvian wine and pisco making,  more important, tasted them. Then it was off to the oasis where the dune buggy and the sand boarding awaits! This dune buggy is legit for those adrenaline junkies, we flew a bit and the sand boarding was so fun!!!!! Please please pleas book this, you won’t regret it!

reviews.title: Wonderful day full of adventures!
reviews.text: We had a wonderful day with Jaime our guide and Henry our driver. All of Jamie’s recommendations were spot on! From the traditional pork sandwich for breakfast to lunch options at the Winery. I really enjoyed every aspect of the tour. From seeing penguins to sand boarding, it was a great first day in Peru!

reviews.title: Amazing experience
reviews.text: Have a great experience with the Tour. Jaime was our guide for the day and he went above and beyond to make the best day for us. He was kind enough to do the explanations both in English and Spanish so our whole party could understand. We could do tons of activities without feeling cramp. Henry was an amazing driver and make us feel comfortable during the long drives. I recommend it.

reviews.title: The best experience in Lima with the best
reviews.text: We had an amazing day.. unbeatable attention.. We were picked up at the hotel, we had breakfast.. all the places were amazing

reviews.title: Wonderful experience!
reviews.text: Fabulous experience! To repeat, beautiful landscapes, delicious food, and the friendly and careful attention of Jaime, the guide, pending all the details. And Carlos, you drive great.  To repeat

reviews.title: Jaime and Patrick were great as the Dynamic Duo!
reviews.text: Our Oasis day trip was an absolute blast! The timing was perfect - not too long, but we managed to squeeze in everything we wanted to do. Jaime provided much history of the region and willingly explained and answered every question with a deep knowledge and insight.Patrick’s adept driving quickly and expertly got us in and out of Lima without any doubt whatsoever. Patrick also managed the tricky traffic of the region without any issues.The sand buggy and sand surfing were an absolute thrill! Jaime was a lifesaver when we arrived at the restaurant. Jaime took the time and effort to ensure our breakfast order was ready, and the food was delicious and hot. Lunch was just as well prepared and thoughtful. And the time we spent at the Tamara winery was a perfect way to wrap up a great adventure. I highly recommend Jaime and Patrick to escort us on another adventure in the future!

reviews.title: Great Adventure & Service
reviews.text: Sand boarding & Dune Buggies - what an adventure near Huacachina Oasis.Due to some time restrictions, Jaime was able to customize trip to meet our needs & desires.Grabbed a great lunch at Tacama Winery.Great service & explanations from Jaime - the right amount of descriptions of the area during the trip as well as some quiet time.Great transportation by our driver Patrick.Adventurous experience! Loved it.
